# oldestCode

**Type Property**

The error code of the first error that occurred since the last call to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)] with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/errors] property.  An `NSNumber`

## Declaration

```swift
static let oldestCode: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.ErrorKey
```

## Type Properties

- **count**: The number of errors that have occurred in processing the current text string, since the last call to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)] with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/errors] property.  An `NSNumber`
- **newestCharacterOffset**: The position in the text string of the most recent error that occurred since the last call to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)] with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/errors] property. An `NSNumber`.
- **newestCode**: The error code of the most recent error that occurred since the last call to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)] with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/errors] property.  An `NSNumber`
- **oldestCharacterOffset**: The position in the text string of the first error that occurred since the last call to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)] with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/errors] property.  An `NSNumber`
